unlink.description: After unlinking, you will not be able to log in using the {{provider}} account "{{providerAccountId}}". If you need to re-link your {{provider}} account to the current account, please ensure that the email address for your {{provider}} account is {{email}}. We will automatically link it to the current logged-in account upon login.
unlink.forbidden: You must retain at least one linked third-party account.
unlink.title: Are you sure you want to unlink the third-party account {{provider}}?
